Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") SpecialReady = Tool:WaitForChild("SpecialReady")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
FiringSound = Handle:WaitForChild("FiringSound") SwingingSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SwingingSound") RisingSound = Handle:WaitForChild("RisingSound")
ToolGrip = CFrame.new(0, -0.25, 0, 0.999993622, -0, -0.00356361363, 0, 1, -0, 0.00356361363, 0, 0.999993622)
Firing = false
BLOXikins = {132922951, 132923435, 132923387, 132923132, 132923240, 132923310, 132923625, 132923762, 132923833, 132923878, 132923921, 132923524, 133519820, 133520439, 133520293, 133520174, 133520394, 133520230, 133520348, 133520071, 133872999, 134043004, 134043071, 134043123, 134043181, 134043336, 134043361, 134043402, 134043441, 133873051, 132923064, 138932292, 144294484, 144294526, 133560053} BLOXikinsInserted = {}
for i, v in pairs(BLOXikins) do local BLOXikinModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(v) local BLOXikin = BLOXikinModel:GetChildren()[1] local BLOXikinName = BLOXikin.Name BLOXikin = BLOXikin:FindFirstChild("Handle"):Clone() BLOXikin.Name = BLOXikinName table.insert(BLOXikinsInserted, BLOXikin) BLOXikinModel:Destroy() end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function MakeCircle(Diameter, Consistency, Size, Position) local Parts = {} for i = 1, 360, Consistency do local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Size Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Position) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(i), 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, Diameter) table.insert(Parts, Part) end return Parts end
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Value = Player Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 2) creator_tag.Parent = Humanoid return creator_tag end
function UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) for i, v in pairs(Humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Fire(TargetPoint, Damage, StartingPosition) local Offset = 1
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Y / 2) + math.random(-Offset, Offset)) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) + 0.25) local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.X / 2) + math.random(-Offset, Offset))
local BLOXikin = BLOXikinsInserted[math.random(1, #BLOXikinsInserted)]:Clone() BLOXikin.CanCollide = false BLOXikin.Locked = true BLOXikin.Name = BLOXikin.Name .. "Projectile" local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = BrickColor.new("Really red").Color Fire.SecondaryColor = Fire.Color Fire.Heat = 10 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Parent = BLOXikin local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.Parent = BLOXikin BLOXikin.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and humanoid and character ~= Character then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) BLOXikin:Destroy() end end end) Debris:AddItem(BLOXikin, 5) BLOXikin.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local BLOXikinCFrame = ((StartingPosition and StartingPosition) or HandleCloneX.CFrame) BLOXikin.CFrame = BLOXikinCFrame BLOXikin.CFrame = CFrame.new(BLOXikinCFrame.p, ((TargetPoint and TargetPoint) or HandleCloneX.Position + Torso.CFrame.lookVector)) BodyVelocity.velocity = BLOXikin.CFrame.lookVector * 50 end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 and Torso then return end Tool.Grip = ToolGrip if not Tool.Enabled then wait(3) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and not Firing then
Firing = true Tool.Enabled = false Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0.25) Fire(Humanoid.TargetPoint, 15, nil) local Play = Instance.new("BoolValue") Play.Name = "Play" Play.Parent = FiringSound wait(0.5) Tool.Grip = ToolGrip wait(0.5) Firing = false Tool.Enabled = true
end end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" and Tool.Enabled and not Firing and SpecialReady.Value then SpecialReady.Value = false Firing = true OriginalWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Tool.Enabled = false local Play = Instance.new("BoolValue") Play.Name = "Play" Play.Parent = SwingingSound for i = 1, 100 do if not Firing then break end Theta = ((i % 10) * (math.pi / 10)) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -math.sin(Theta), math.cos(Theta)) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, math.cos(Theta), math.sin(Theta)) Fire(nil, 10, nil) wait() end local Stop = Instance.new("BoolValue") Stop.Name = "Stop" Stop.Parent = SwingingSound Tool.Grip = ToolGrip Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed OriginalWalkSpeed = nil Firing = false Tool.Enabled = true elseif Key == "e" and Tool.Enabled and not Firing and SpecialReady.Value then Firing = true OriginalWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Tool.Enabled = false local Rate = 0.1 for i = Rate, (((Handle.Size.Y + 1.125) / 2) / Rate) do if not Firing then break end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(Tool.GripPos.X, (Tool.GripPos.Y + 0.05), Tool.GripPos.Z) wait() end local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character}) if Hit and Firing then SpecialReady.Value = false local Parts = MakeCircle(3, 60, Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), EndPosition) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do v.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright orange") v.Material = Enum.Material.Granite v.Anchored = true v.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4) local PartCFrame = v.CFrame Debris:AddItem(v, 15) v.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") v.CFrame = PartCFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.random(), math.random(),math.random()) end local Play = Instance.new("BoolValue") Play.Name = "Play" Play.Parent = RisingSound for i = 1, 100 do if not Firing then break end local FirePosition = CFrame.new(EndPosition) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(math.random(1, 360)), 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, 5) Fire(FirePosition.p + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0), 20, FirePosition) wait() end local Stop = Instance.new("BoolValue") Stop.Name = "Stop" Stop.Parent = RisingSound else Tool.Grip = ToolGrip Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed OriginalWalkSpeed = nil Firing = false Tool.Enabled = true end if Hit then Tool.Grip = ToolGrip Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed OriginalWalkSpeed = nil Firing = false Tool.Enabled = true end end end) end
function Unequipped(Mouse) Firing = false local Stop = Instance.new("BoolValue") Stop.Name = "Stop" Stop.Parent = SwingingSound local Stop = Instance.new("BoolValue") Stop.Name = "Stop" Stop.Parent = RisingSound if OriginalWalkSpeed then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") SpecialReady = Tool:WaitForChild("SpecialReady") SpecialReady.Value = true SpecialReady.Changed:connect(function() if not SpecialReady.Value then wait(15) SpecialReady.Value = true end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
for i, v in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Sound") then v.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) if Child.Name == "Play" then v:Play() elseif Child.Name == "Stop" then v:Stop() end Delay(0, function() Child:Destroy() end) end) end end
